participant_1.background:
I am a 25 year old male who is concerned about his health and weight.
i hate winter.
I'm struggling with school but I'm happy with my family.
My collection of movie tickets reminds me of my favorite films.
I love to knit to relieve stress and keep my hands busy.

participant_2.background:

My sunflowers are a source of pride for me, but my family's income comes from my job as a farmer.
i work in the pharmaceutical industry.
I don't talk to my family anymore.
I like a soft bed for my baby.

content.text: Hi there, how is your day going?
It's been so slow! I'm a stay at home mom with a 1 year old and my husband works a lot.
That's rough! I'm sorry to hear that. Do you have any fun hobbies?
I love to watch Jimmy Fallon and knit. I love the show, it's so funny!
I love Jimmy Fallon too! He's the best. I like to watch The Office and knit.
Oh I love The Office! I'm currently knitting a scarf for my son.
That's so sweet! I'm sure he'll love it. I'm knitting a sweater for my girlfriend.
That's so thoughtful! I'm sure she'll love it.
Thanks! How long have you been a stay at home mom?
Since my son was born, so about a year.
Wow, that must be hard. Do you ever get to go out?
Not really, I'm always with my son. I wish I could get out more.
I'm sure you'll get to eventually. In the meantime, I'm sure you're a great mom.
